column1: <ruby>我没有问题。<rt>Wǒ méiyǒu wèntí.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I don't have any questions.
- Negation of "you" with "mei"
- 没 + 有 (+ Obj.)

column1: <ruby>我们现在没有钱。<rt>Wǒmen xiànzài méiyǒu qián.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- We don't have money now.
- Negation of "you" with "mei"
- 没 + 有 (+ Obj.)

column1: <ruby>他没有工作吗？<rt>Tā méiyǒu gōngzuò ma?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Does he not have a job?
- Negation of "you" with "mei"
- 没 + 有 (+ Obj.)

column1: <ruby>他们没有爸爸妈妈。<rt>Tāmen méiyǒu bàba māma.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- They don't have parents.
- Negation of "you" with "mei"
- 没 + 有 (+ Obj.)

column1: <ruby>我们在北京没有房子。<rt>Wǒmen zài Běijīng méiyǒu fángzi.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- We don't have a house in Beijing.

- 没 + 有 (+ Obj.)

column1: <ruby>你爸爸没有手机吗？<rt>Nǐ bàba méiyǒu shǒujī ma?</rt></ruby>

- Negation of "you" with "mei"
- 没 + 有 (+ Obj.)

column1: <ruby>你们在上海没有朋友吗？<rt>Nǐmen zài Shànghǎi méiyǒu péngyou ma?</rt></ruby>

- 没 + 有 (+ Obj.)

column1: <ruby>我的老师现在没有男朋友。<rt>Wǒ de lǎoshī xiànzài méiyǒu nánpéngyou.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- My teacher doesn't have a boyfriend now.

- 没 + 有 (+ Obj.)

column1: <ruby>他们都没有电脑吗？<rt>Tāmen dōu méiyǒu diànnǎo ma?</rt></ruby>
column3:

- 没 + 有 (+ Obj.)

column1: <ruby>这个周末你们都没有时间吗？<rt>Zhège zhōumò nǐmen dōu méiyǒu shíjiān ma?</rt></ruby>

- Do you all not have time this weekend?

- 没 + 有 (+ Obj.)

column1: <ruby>我没有车。<rt>Wǒ méiyǒu chē.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I don't have a car.
- Always use 没 with 有.
- Negation of "you" with "mei"
- 没 + 有 (+ Obj.)

column1: <ruby>我没钱。<rt>Wǒ méi qián.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- 没 + 有 (+ Obj.)

column1: <ruby>你没男朋友吗？<rt>Nǐ méi nánpéngyou ma?</rt></ruby>

- 没 + 有 (+ Obj.)

column1: <ruby>你们没车吗？<rt>Nǐmen méi chē ma?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- You don't have a car?

- 没 + 有 (+ Obj.)

column1: <ruby>老板现在没时间。<rt>Lǎobǎn xiànzài méi shíjiān.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- 没 + 有 (+ Obj.)

column1: <ruby>我没工作，我老公也没工作。<rt>Wǒ méi gōngzuò, wǒ lǎogōng yě méi gōngzuò.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I don't have a job. My husband doesn't have a job either.
- Negation of "you" with "mei"
- 没 + 有 (+ Obj.)

column1: <ruby>你们都认识John吗？<rt>Nǐmen dōu rènshi John ma?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Do you all know John?

- Subj. + 都 + [Verb Phrase]

column1: <ruby>他们都在上海。<rt>Tāmen dōu zài Shànghǎi.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- They are all in Shanghai.

- Subj. + 都 + [Verb Phrase]

- Subj. + 都 + [Verb Phrase]

column1: <ruby>你们都用wiki吗？<rt>Nǐmen dōu yòng wiki ma?</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>我们都要冰水。<rt>Wǒmen dōu yào bīngshuǐ .</rt></ruby>

- Subj. + 都 + [Verb Phrase]

column1: <ruby>我和我太太都不吃肉。<rt>Wǒ hé wǒ tàitai dōu bù chī ròu.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>她也有一个儿子。<rt>Tā yě yǒu yī gè érzi.</rt></ruby>

- Subj. + 也 + Verb / [Verb Phrase]

- Subj. + 也 (+ Adv.) + Adj.

column1: <ruby>我也是。<rt>Wǒ yě shì.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I am too. / Me too.

- Subj. + 也 (+ Adv.) + Adj.

column1: <ruby>A:我是美国人。 B:我也是。<rt>Wǒ shì Měiguó rén. Wǒ yě shì.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>A:我喜欢看书。 B:我也喜欢。<rt>Wǒ xǐhuan kàn shū. Wǒ yě xǐhuan.</rt></ruby>

- Subj. + 也 (+ Adv.) + Adj.

column1: <ruby>你和我<rt>nǐ hé wǒ</rt></ruby>

- Structure of dates
- x 年 + y 月 + z 号

column1: <ruby>12月24日是平安夜。<rt>Shí-èryuè èrshí-sì rì shì Píng'ān Yè.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- December 24th is Christmas Eve.
- Structure of dates
- x 年 + y 月 + z 号

column1: <ruby>10月1号我们去上海。<rt>Shíyuè yī hào wǒmen qù Shànghǎi.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- We will go to Shanghai on October 1st.
- Structure of dates
- x 年 + y 月 + z 号

column1: <ruby>我1990年7月出生。<rt>Wǒ Yī-jiǔ-jiǔ-líng nián Qīyuè chūshēng.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I was born in July 1990.
- Structure of dates
- x 年 + y 月 + z 号

column1: <ruby>你的生日是11月11号吗？<rt>Nǐ de shēngrì shì Shíyīyuè shíyī hào ma?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Is your birthday November 11th?
- Structure of dates
- x 年 + y 月 + z 号

column1: <ruby>我2006年4月17号认识了他。<rt>Wǒ èr-líng-líng-liù nián Sìyuè shíqī hào rènshi le tā.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I met him on April 17, 2006.
- Structure of dates
- x 年 + y 月 + z 号

column1: <ruby>1980年9月4号我们结婚了。<rt>Yī-jiǔ-bā-líng nián Jiǔyuè sì hào wǒmen jiéhūn le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- We got married on September 4th, 1980.
- Structure of dates
- x 年 + y 月 + z 号

column1: <ruby>今天是星期一吗？<rt>Jīntiān shì Xīngqīyī ma?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Is today Monday?
- 是 is optional
- Structure of days of the week

column1: <ruby>明天星期五，太高兴了。<rt>Míngtiān Xīngqīwǔ, tài gāoxìng le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Tomorrow is Friday. I'm so happy.
- Optional 是 omitted
- Structure of days of the week

column1: <ruby>星期三我不在上海。<rt>Xīngqīsān wǒ bù zài Shànghǎi.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I'm not here in Shanghai on Wednesday.
- Structure of days of the week

column1: <ruby>星期二早上我很忙。<rt>Xīngqī'èr zǎoshang wǒ hěn máng.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I am busy on Tuesday morning.
- Structure of days of the week

column1: <ruby>你星期天要做什么？<rt>Nǐ Xīngqītiān yào zuò shénme?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- What are you doing on Sunday?
- Structure of days of the week

column1: <ruby>上个星期五我跟他见面了。<rt>Shàng gè Xīngqīwǔ wǒ gēn tā jiànmiàn le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I met him last Friday.
- Structure of days of the week

column1: <ruby>这个星期三晚上你有空吗？<rt>Zhège Xīngqīsān wǎnshang nǐ yǒu kòng ma?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Are you free this Wednesday evening?
- Structure of days of the week

column1: <ruby>下个星期四是我的生日。<rt>Xià gè Xīngqīsì shì wǒ de shēngrì.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- My birthday is on next Thursday.
- Structure of days of the week

column1: <ruby>这个星期五晚上我们要去酒吧。<rt>Zhège Xīngqīwǔ wǎnshang wǒmen yào qù jiǔbā.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- We're going to a bar this Friday night.
- Structure of days of the week
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/这个星期五晚上我们要去酒吧.mp3]

column1: <ruby>星期六和星期天我们不上班。<rt>Xīngqīliù hé Xīngqītiān wǒmen bù shàngbān.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Saturday and Sunday we don't work.
- Structure of days of the week
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/星期六和星期天我们不上班.mp3]

column1: <ruby>九点<rt>jiǔ diǎn</rt></ruby>

- (Date and/or time of day +) x 点

- (Date and/or time of day +) x 点

column1: <ruby>五点半<rt>wǔ diǎn bàn</rt></ruby>

- x 点 + 半

column3:

- Structure of times (basic)
- x 点 + 半

column1: <ruby>星期天上午十点半<rt>Xīngqītiān shàngwǔ shí diǎn bàn</rt></ruby>

- x 点 + 半

column1: <ruby>昨天晚上七点半<rt>zuótiān wǎnshang qī diǎn bàn</rt></ruby>

- x 点 + 半

- x 点 + 半

column1: <ruby>我家很大。<rt>Wǒ jiā hěn dà.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>这个很好，那个呢？<rt>Zhège hěn hǎo, nàge ne?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- This one is good. What about that one?
- Questions with "ne"
- Topic + 呢 ？

column1: <ruby>这个用中文怎么说？那个呢？<rt>Zhège yòng Zhōngwén zěnme shuō? Nàge ne?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- How do I say this in Chinese? And that?
- Questions with "ne"
- Topic + 呢 ？

column1: <ruby>我在家，你呢？<rt>Wǒ zài jiā. Nǐ ne?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I'm at home. What about you?
- Questions with "ne"
- Topic + 呢 ？

column1: <ruby>你爸爸是上海人，你妈妈呢？<rt>Nǐ bàba shì Shànghǎi rén, nǐ māma ne?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Your father is Shanghainese. And your mom?
- Questions with "ne"
- Topic + 呢 ？

column1: <ruby>你哥哥有工作，弟弟呢？<rt>Nǐ gēge yǒu gōngzuò. Dìdi ne?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Your big brother has a job. What about your little brother?
- Questions with "ne"
- Topic + 呢 ？

column1: <ruby>北京下雨了。上海呢？<rt>Běijīng xiàyǔ le. Shànghǎi ne?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- It's raining in Beijing. How about in Shanghai?
- Questions with "ne"
- Topic + 呢 ？

column1: <ruby>我现在要出去。你呢？<rt>Wǒ xiànzài yào chūqù. Nǐ ne?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I'm going to go out now. How about you?
- Questions with "ne"
- Topic + 呢 ？

column1: <ruby>我知道你会说中文。你老公呢？<rt>Wǒ zhīdào nǐ huì shuō Zhōngwén. Nǐ lǎogōng ne?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I know you can speak Chinese. What about your husband?
- Questions with "ne"
- Topic + 呢 ？

column1: <ruby>这个周末我想去酒吧。你们呢？<rt>Zhège zhōumò wǒ xiǎng qù jiǔbā. Nǐmen ne?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I want to go to a bar this weekend. What about you all?
- Questions with "ne"
- Topic + 呢 ？

column1: <ruby>今天晚上没空？明天晚上呢？<rt>Jīntiān wǎnshang méi kòng? Míngtiān wǎnshang ne?</rt></ruby>

- Questions with "ne"
- Topic + 呢 ？

column1: <ruby>钱呢？<rt>Qián ne?</rt></ruby>

- Where's the money?
- Questions with "ne"
- [Missing Person / Thing] + 呢 ？

column1: <ruby>你妈妈呢？<rt>Nǐ māma ne?</rt></ruby>

- Questions with "ne"
- [Missing Person / Thing] + 呢 ？

column1: <ruby>我们走吧。<rt>Wǒmen zǒu ba.</rt></ruby>

- This is a suggestion.
- Suggestions with "ba"
- Command + 吧

column1: <ruby>你说吧。<rt>Nǐ shuō ba.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- You say it.
- This is a suggestion.
- Suggestions with "ba"
- Command + 吧

column1: <ruby>快点吃吧。<rt>Kuài diǎn chī ba.</rt></ruby>

- This is a suggestion.
- Suggestions with "ba"
- Command + 吧

column1: <ruby>给我两个吧。<rt>Gěi wǒ liǎng gè ba.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Give me two.
- This is a suggestion.
- Suggestions with "ba"
- Command + 吧

column1: <ruby>喝水吧。<rt>Hē shuǐ ba.</rt></ruby>

- Have some water.
- This is a suggestion.
- Suggestions with "ba"
- Command + 吧

column1: <ruby>我们去香港吧。<rt>Wǒmen qù Xiānggǎng ba.</rt></ruby>

- Suggestions with "ba"
- Command + 吧

- Suggestions with "ba"
- Command + 吧

- whole word repeated
- Affirmative-negative question
- [First Character of Adj.] + 不 + Adj.

- Affirmative-negative question
- [First Character of Adj.] + 不 + Adj.

column1: <ruby>A:你喜欢吃什么菜？ B:我喜欢吃中国菜。<rt>Nǐ xǐhuan chī shénme cài? Wǒ xǐhuan chī Zhōngguó cài.</rt></ruby>

- Subj. + Verb + 什么 + (Noun) ?

column1: <ruby>A:你在看什么书？ B:我在看小说。<rt>Nǐ zài kàn shénme shū? Wǒ zài kàn xiǎoshuō.</rt></ruby>

- Subj. + Verb + 什么 + (Noun) ?

column1: <ruby>我饿死了。<rt>Wǒ è  sǐ le!</rt></ruby>

- Negative adjectives with "-si le"
- Adj. + 死了

column1: <ruby>今天累死了。<rt>Jīntiān lèi  sǐ le!</rt></ruby>

- Negative adjectives with "-si le"

column1: <ruby>热死了！<rt>Rè  sǐ le!</rt></ruby>

- Negative adjectives with "-si le"
- Adj. + 死了

column1: <ruby>这几天忙死了。<rt>Zhè jǐ tiān máng  sǐ le!</rt></ruby>

- Negative adjectives with "-si le"
- Adj. + 死了

column1: <ruby>这件衣服丑死了。<rt>Zhè jiàn yīfu chǒu sǐ le!</rt></ruby>

- Negative adjectives with "-si le"
- Adj. + 死了

- Negative adjectives with "-si le"
- Adj. + 死了

column1: <ruby>吵死了！<rt>Chǎo sǐ le!</rt></ruby>

- Literally, "noisy to death"
- Negative adjectives with "-si le"
- Adj. + 死了

column1: <ruby>这里的东西贵死了。<rt>Zhèlǐ de dōngxi guì sǐ le!</rt></ruby>

- Negative adjectives with "-si le"
- Adj. + 死了

column1: <ruby>我们都急死了。<rt>Wǒmen dōu jí sǐ le!</rt></ruby>

- Negative adjectives with "-si le"
- Adj. + 死了

column1: <ruby>这个孩子烦死了。<rt>Zhège háizi fán sǐ le!</rt></ruby>

- Negative adjectives with "-si le"
- Adj. + 死了

column1: <ruby>哇，可爱死了！<rt>Wā, kě'ài sǐ le!</rt></ruby>

- Adj. + 死了

column1: <ruby>这几个地方都差不多。<rt>Zhè jǐ gè dìfang dōu chàbuduō.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- These places are all pretty much the same.
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- Subj. + 差不多

column1: <ruby>这两个词的意思差不多。<rt>Zhè liǎng gè cí de yìsi chàbuduō.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- The meanings of these two words are pretty much the same.
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- Subj. + 差不多

column1: <ruby>我们的想法差不多。<rt>Wǒmen de xiǎngfǎ chàbuduō.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Our ways of thinking are pretty much the same.
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- Subj. + 差不多

column1: <ruby>那两家餐厅的菜差不多。<rt>Nà liǎng jiā cāntīng de cài chàbuduō.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Those two restaurants' dishes are almost the same.
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- Subj. + 差不多

column1: <ruby>你们的中文水平差不多。<rt>Nǐmen de Zhōngwén shuǐpíng chàbuduō.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Your Chinese levels are almost the same.
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- Subj. + 差不多

column1: <ruby>上海和纽约差不多。<rt>Shànghǎi hé Niǔyuē chàbuduō.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Shanghai and New York are basically the same.
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- A + 跟 / 和 + B + 差不多

column1: <ruby>Starbucks和Costa差不多。<rt>Starbucks hé Costa chàbuduō.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Starbucks and Costa are almost the same.
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- A + 跟 / 和 + B + 差不多

column1: <ruby>这里的天气跟台湾的天气差不多。<rt>Zhèlǐ de tiānqì gēn Táiwān de tiānqì chàbuduō.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- The weather here is pretty much like Taiwan's.
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- A + 跟 / 和 + B + 差不多

column1: <ruby>你的工作跟我的工作差不多。<rt>Nǐ de gōngzuò gēn wǒ de gōngzuò chàbuduō.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>你的新手机跟我的旧手机差不多。<rt>Nǐ de xīn shǒujī gēn wǒ de jiù shǒujī chàbuduō.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>这两个孩子差不多大。<rt>Zhè liǎng gè háizi chàbuduō dà.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- These two children are more or less the same age.
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- 差不多 + Adj. / Verb

column1: <ruby>我跟我哥哥差不多高。<rt>Wǒ gēn wǒ gēge chàbuduō gāo.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- My older brother and I are more or less the same height.
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- 差不多 + Adj. / Verb

column1: <ruby>我差不多到公园门口了。<rt>Wǒ chàbuduō dào gōngyuán ménkǒu le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I'm almost at the entrance of the park.
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- 差不多 + Adj. / Verb

column1: <ruby>电影差不多要开始了。<rt>Diànyǐng chàbuduō yào kāishǐ le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- The movie is almost about to start.
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- 差不多 + Adj. / Verb

column1: <ruby>今天的工作差不多做完了。<rt>Jīntiān de gōngzuò chàbuduō zuò wán le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Today's work is almost done.
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- 差不多 + Adj. / Verb

column1: <ruby>你儿子差不多五岁了吧？<rt>Nǐ érzi chàbuduō wǔ suì le ba?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Your son should be about 5 years old, right?
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- 差不多 ＋ [Quantity Phrase] / [Time Phrase]

column1: <ruby>他住在上海差不多三个月了。<rt>Tā zhù zài Shànghǎi chàbuduō sān gè yuè le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- He has lived in Shanghai for about three months.
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- 差不多 ＋ [Quantity Phrase] / [Time Phrase]

column1: <ruby>我在这家公司工作了差不多十年了。<rt>Wǒ zài zhè jiā gōngsī gōngzuò le chàbuduō shí nián le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I've worked for this company for almost ten years.
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- 差不多 ＋ [Quantity Phrase] / [Time Phrase]
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/我在这家公司工作了差不多十年了.mp3]

column1: <ruby>我父母结婚差不多二十年了。<rt>Wǒ fùmǔ jiéhūn chàbuduō èrshí nián le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- My parents have been married for about twenty years.
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- 差不多 ＋ [Quantity Phrase] / [Time Phrase]

column1: <ruby>差不多两个星期以前，我在北京见过他。<rt>Chàbuduō liǎng gè xīngqī yǐqián, wǒ zài Běijīng jiàn guo tā.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- About two weeks ago I met with him in Beijing.
- Approximations with "chabuduo"
- 差不多 ＋ [Quantity Phrase] / [Time Phrase]
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/差不多两个星期以前我在北京见过他.mp3]

column1: <ruby>很多地方都有wifi。<rt>Hěn duō dìfang dōu yǒu wifi.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- A lot of places have wifi.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>我的很多朋友都有车。<rt>Wǒ de  hěn duō péngyou dōu yǒu chē.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- A lot of my friends have cars.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>很多美国人都喜欢喝咖啡。<rt>Hěn duō  Měiguó rén dōu xǐhuan hē kāfēi.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- A lot of Americans like drinking coffee.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>很多孩子都不喜欢上学。<rt>Hěn duō háizi dōu bù xǐhuan shàngxué.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- A lot of kids don't like to go to school.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>很多年轻人都想在大城市工作。<rt>Hěn duō niánqīng rén dōu xiǎng zài dà chéngshì gōngzuò.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- A lot of young people want to go to work in big cities.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/很多年轻人都想在大城市工作.mp3]

column1: <ruby>大家都来了吗？<rt>Dàjiā dōu lái le ma?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Is everyone here?
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>大家都应该知道。<rt>Dàjiā dōu yīnggāi zhīdào.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Everyone should know.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>大家都说你很聪明。<rt>Dàjiā  dōu shuō nǐ hěn cōngming.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Everyone says you're smart.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>大家都忘了他的名字。<rt>Dàjiā dōu wàng le tā de míngzi.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Everyone forgot his name.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>大家都喜欢吃辣吗？<rt>Dàjiā dōu xǐhuan chī là ma?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Does everyone like eating spicy food?
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>我每天都要上班。<rt>Wǒ měi tiān  dōu yào shàngbān.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I have to go to work every day.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>老师每天都迟到。<rt>Lǎoshī měi tiān  dōu chídào.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- The teacher comes late every day.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>她每天都不吃早饭。<rt>Tā měi tiān dōu bù chī zǎofàn.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Every day, she does not eat breakfast.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>我女朋友每天都上淘宝。<rt>Wǒ  nǚpéngyou měi tiān dōu shàng Táobǎo.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- My girlfriend goes on Taobao every day.
- Taobao is China's biggest online shopping website.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>妈妈每天都给我们做晚饭。<rt>Māma měi tiān dōu gěi wǒmen zuò wǎnfàn.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Mom cooks dinner for us every day.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>美国人都说英文。<rt>Měiguó rén dōu shuō Yīngwén.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Americans all speak English.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>我们五个人都去。<rt>Wǒmen wǔ gè rén dōu qù.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- All five of us are going.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>四川人都喜欢吃辣。<rt>Sìchuān rén dōu xǐhuan chī là.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Sichuanese people all like eating spicy food.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>我的家人都没去过中国。<rt>Wǒ de jiārén dōu méi qù guo Zhōngguó.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- None of my family members has been to China.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>我的学生都喜欢问问题。<rt>Wǒ de xuéshēng dōu xǐhuan wèn wèntí.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- My students all like to ask questions.
- Emphasizing quantity with "dou"
- Subj. + 都 + Verb + Obj.

column1: <ruby>我一直在学习中文。<rt>Wǒ yīzhí zài xuéxí Zhōngwén.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I've been studying Chinese all along.
- Expressing "all along" with "yizhi"
- Subj. + 一直 + Predicate

column1: <ruby>昨天晚上我一直在做作业。<rt>Zuótiān wǎnshang wǒ yīzhí zài zuò zuòyè.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Yesterday evening I was continuously doing homework.
- Expressing "all along" with "yizhi"
- Subj. + 一直 + Predicate

column1: <ruby>老板一直很忙。<rt>Lǎobǎn yīzhí hěn máng.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- The boss is always very busy.
- Always is more natural than "continuously."
- Expressing "all along" with "yizhi"
- Subj. + 一直 + Predicate

column1: <ruby>我一直很喜欢你。<rt>Wǒ yīzhí hěn xǐhuan nǐ.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I've always liked you a lot.
- Expressing "all along" with "yizhi"
- Subj. + 一直 + Predicate

column1: <ruby>爸爸一直都不抽烟。<rt>Bàba yīzhí dōu bù chōuyān.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- What is your favorite color?
- Superlative "zui"
- 最 + [Psychological Verb] + Obj. (+ 了)

column1: <ruby>你最喜欢什么动物？<rt>Nǐ zuì xǐhuan shénme dòngwù?</rt></ruby>
column3:

- 最 + [Psychological Verb] + Obj. (+ 了)

column1: <ruby>我喝咖啡或者茶，都行。<rt>Wǒ hē kāfēi huòzhě chá, dōu xíng.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I drink coffee or tea. Either is OK.
- Expressing "or" in statements
- Possibility 1 + 或者 + Possibility 2

column1: <ruby>星期六或者星期天，都可以。<rt>Xīngqīliù huòzhě Xīngqītiān, dōu kěyǐ.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Saturday or Sunday are both OK.
- Expressing "or" in statements
- Possibility 1 + 或者 + Possibility 2

column1: <ruby>今天晚上我想吃披萨或者寿司。<rt>Jīntiān wǎnshang wǒ xiǎng chī pīsà huòzhě shòusī.</rt></ruby>

- Possibility 1 + 或者 + Possibility 2
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/今天晚上我想吃披萨或者寿司.mp3]

column1: <ruby>周末的时候，我喜欢在家做饭或者看电影。<rt>Zhōumò de shíhou, wǒ xǐhuan zài jiā zuòfàn huòzhě kàn diànyǐng.</rt></ruby>

- Expressing "or" in statements
- Possibility 1 + 或者 + Possibility 2

column1: <ruby>你去或者她去，都可以。<rt>Nǐ qù huòzhě tā qù, dōu kěyǐ.</rt></ruby>

- Possibility 1 + 或者 + Possibility 2

column1: <ruby>那个⋯⋯我不跟你们一起去了，可以吗？<rt>Nèige... wǒ bù   gēn nǐmen yīqǐ qù le, kěyǐ ma?</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>桌子上有几本书。<rt>Zhuōzi shàng yǒu jǐ běn shū.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- There are a few books on the table.
- Using "ji" to mean "several"
- 几 + Measure Word + Noun

column1: <ruby>只有几个人去过那个地方。<rt>Zhǐyǒu jǐ gè rén qù guo nàge dìfang.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- Using "ji" to mean "several"
- 几 + Measure Word + Noun

column1: <ruby>从上海到东京坐飞机只要几个小时。<rt>Cóng Shànghǎi dào Dōngjīng zuò fēijī zhǐ yào jǐ gè xiǎoshí.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>我每天都要喝几杯咖啡。<rt>Wǒ měi tiān dōu yào hē jǐ bēi kāfēi.</rt></ruby>

- 几 + Measure Word + Noun

column1: <ruby>老板今天开了几个重要的会。<rt>Lǎobǎn jīntiān kāi le jǐ gè zhòngyào de huì.</rt></ruby>

- 几 + Measure Word + Noun

column1: <ruby>他只想学几十个汉字。<rt>Tā zhǐ xiǎng xué jǐ shí gè Hànzì.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- He only wants to study a few dozen Chinese characters.
- Dozens is the closest we can get in natural English to the Chinese, which literally means "tens."
- Using "ji" to mean "several"
- 几 + 十 + Measure Word + Noun

column1: <ruby>我们公司有几十个员工。<rt>Wǒmen gōngsī yǒu jǐ shí gè yuángōng.</rt></ruby>

- Using "ji" to mean "several"
- 几 + 十 + Measure Word + Noun

column1: <ruby>他写过几十本书，我都喜欢。<rt>Tā xiě guo jǐ shí běn shū, wǒ dōu xǐhuan.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- He wrote a few dozen books. I like them all.
- Using "ji" to mean "several"
- 几 + 十 + Measure Word + Noun

column1: <ruby>这个年轻的演员演了几十部电影。我都喜欢。<rt>Zhège niánqīng de yǎnyuán yǎn le jǐ shí bù diànyǐng. Wǒ dōu xǐhuan.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- Using "ji" to mean "several"
- 几 + 十 + Measure Word + Noun

- 几 + 百 / 千 / 万 + Measure Word + Noun

column1: <ruby>这篇文章有几万个字，太长了。<rt>Zhè piān wénzhāng yǒu jǐ wàn gè zì, tài cháng le.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>我认识一个朋友，她有几百双鞋。<rt>Wǒ rènshi yī gè péngyou, tā yǒu jǐ bǎi shuāng xié.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>我有好几个室友。<rt>Wǒ yǒu hǎojǐ gè shìyǒu.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>我奶奶有好几个孩子。<rt>Wǒ nǎinai yǒu hǎojǐ gè háizi.</rt></ruby>

- 好几 + Measure Word + Noun

column1: <ruby>我们去过好几次北京。<rt>Wǒmen qù guo hǎojǐ cì Běijīng.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>下雨了。<rt>Xià yǔ le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- It's raining.
- It wasn't raining, but now it is.
- Change of state with "le"
- [New Situation] + 了

column1: <ruby>妈妈老了。<rt>Māma lǎo le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Mom is old.
- We aren't used to thinking of her as old, but she is now.
- Change of state with "le"
- [New Situation] + 了

column1: <ruby>你胖了。<rt>Nǐ pàng le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- You've gotten fat.
- You used to not be fat.
- Change of state with "le"
- [New Situation] + 了

column1: <ruby>家里没有牛奶了。<rt>Jiālǐ méiyǒu niúnǎi le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- We don't have any milk at home.

- Change of state with "le"
- [New Situation] + 了

column1: <ruby>爸爸今年50岁了。<rt>Bàba jīnnián wǔshí suì le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Dad is 50 years old this year.

- Change of state with "le"
- [New Situation] + 了

column1: <ruby>手机没电了。<rt>Shǒujī méi diàn le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- The cell phone ran out of power.

- Change of state with "le"
- [New Situation] + 了

column1: <ruby>宝宝会说话了。<rt>Bǎobao huì shuōhuà le.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- Change of state with "le"
- [New Situation] + 了

column1: <ruby>你哥哥有女朋友了吗？<rt>Nǐ gēge yǒu nǚpéngyou le ma?</rt></ruby>

- He didn't have one before.

- [New Situation] + 了

column1: <ruby>我男朋友找到新工作了。<rt>Wǒ nánpéngyou zhǎodào xīn gōngzuò le.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- A big change for sure.

- [New Situation] + 了

- [New Situation] + 了

column1: <ruby>A:太贵了！ B:好吧，我们可以看看别的。<rt>Tài guì le! Hǎo  ba, wǒmen kěyǐ kànkan biéde.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- That's too expensive! All right, we can take a look at something else.
- Conceding with "ba"
- Statement + 吧

column1: <ruby>A:下午我不在家，你可以晚上来吗？ B:行吧。<rt>Xiàwǔ wǒ bù zài jiā, nǐ kěyǐ wǎnshang lái ma? Xíng ba.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- This afternoon I won't be home. Can you come by this evening? All right.
- Conceding with "ba"
- Statement + 吧

column1: <ruby>A:雨太大了，明天再去买吧。 B:好吧，但是明天一定要买到。<rt>Yǔ tài dà le, míngtiān zài qù mǎi ba. Hǎo  ba, dànshì míngtiān yídìng yào mǎidào.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- It's raining heavily. Let's go buy it tomorrow. Fine, but tomorrow we definitely have to buy it.
- Conceding with "ba"
- Statement + 吧

column1: <ruby>A:可以带朋友吗？ B:行吧，但是不能带女孩。<rt>Kěyǐ dài péngyou ma ? Xíng  ba, dànshì bù néng dài nǚhái.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Can I bring friends? All right, but you can't bring girls.
- Conceding with "ba"
- Statement + 吧

column1: <ruby>A:我今天不太舒服，你可以自己去吗？ B:好吧，那你好好休息。<rt>Wǒ jīntiān bù tài shūfu, nǐ kěyǐ zìjǐ qù ma? Hǎo ba, nà nǐ hǎohǎo xiūxi.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>A:老板呢？ B:他走了。<rt>Lǎobǎn ne? Tā zǒu le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Where is the boss? He (already) left.
- Expressing "already" with just "le"
- Subj. + [Verb Phrase] + 了

column1: <ruby>A:孩子还在上大学吗？ B:他们工作了。<rt>Háizi hái zài shàng dàxué ma? Tāmen gōngzuò le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Are your kids still in college? They (already) work.
- This expression emphasizes that they're not students anymore, and have already entered the workforce.
- Expressing "already" with just "le"
- Subj. + [Verb Phrase] + 了

column1: <ruby>A:用我的车吧？ B:谢谢，我们有车了。<rt>Yòng wǒ de chē ba? Xièxie, wǒmen yǒu chē le.</rt></ruby>

- How about using my car? Thanks. We (already) have a car.

- Subj. + [Verb Phrase] + 了

column1: <ruby>A:你要不要告诉他？ B:他知道了。<rt>Nǐ yào bu yào gàosu tā? Tā zhīdào le.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>在学校就得听老师的话。<rt>Zài xuéxiào jiù děi tīng lǎoshī de huà.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- You have to listen to the teacher at school.
- Expressing "must" with "dei"
- Subj. + 得 + [Verb Phrase]

column1: <ruby>你得先付钱再进。<rt>Nǐ děi xiān fù qián zài jìn.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- You need to pay before you come inside.
- Expressing "must" with "dei"
- Subj. + 得 + [Verb Phrase]

column1: <ruby>是你的错，你得道歉。<rt>Shì nǐ de cuò, nǐ děi dàoqiàn.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- It's your fault. You must apologize.
- Expressing "must" with "dei"
- Subj. + 得 + [Verb Phrase]

column1: <ruby>他没有经验，你得教教他。<rt>Tā méiyǒu jīngyàn, nǐ děi jiāojiao tā.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- He doesn't have experience. You must teach him.
- Expressing "must" with "dei"
- Subj. + 得 + [Verb Phrase]

column1: <ruby>明天去面试，你得穿得正式一点。<rt>Míngtiān qù miànshì, nǐ děi chuān de zhèngshì yīdiǎn.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- You must wear something more formal for tomorrow's job interview.
- Expressing "must" with "dei"
- Subj. + 得 + [Verb Phrase]
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/明天去面试你得穿得正式一点.mp3]

column1: <ruby>你病得太厉害了，得去看医生。<rt>Nǐ bìng de tài lìhai le, děi qù kàn yīshēng.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- You are badly ill. You must go see a doctor.
- Expressing "must" with "dei"
- Subj. + 得 + [Verb Phrase]
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/你病得太厉害了得去看医生.mp3]

column1: <ruby>他不怎么爱说话。<rt>Tā bù zěnme ài shuōhuà.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- Subj. + 不怎么 + Verb

column1: <ruby>我老公不怎么运动。<rt>Wǒ lǎogōng bù zěnme yùndòng.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- Subj. + 不怎么 + Verb

column1: <ruby>我们在家不怎么看电视。<rt>Wǒmen zài jiā bù zěnme kàn diànshì.</rt></ruby>

- Subj. + 不怎么 + Verb

column1: <ruby>我儿子不怎么吃零食。<rt>Wǒ érzi bùzěnme chī língshí.</rt></ruby>

- Subj. + 不怎么 + Verb

column1: <ruby>老板不怎么来办公室。<rt>Lǎobǎn bù zěnme lái bàngōngshì.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- My boss doesn't come to the office very often.

- Subj. + 不怎么 + Verb

- Subj. + 不怎么 + Verb

- Subj. + 不怎么 + Verb

column1: <ruby>我没怎么复习。<rt>Wǒ méi zěnme fùxí.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- Subj. + 不怎么 + Verb

column1: <ruby>我没怎么想过这个问题。<rt>Wǒ méi zěnme xiǎng guo zhège wèntí.</rt></ruby>

- Subj. + 不怎么 + Verb

column1: <ruby>不用担心。<rt>Bùyòng dānxīn.</rt></ruby>

- Subj. + 不用 + [Verb Phrase]

- Subj. + 不用 + [Verb Phrase]

- Subj. + 不用 + [Verb Phrase]

- Subj. + 不用 + [Verb Phrase]

- Subj. + 不用 + [Verb Phrase]

column1: <ruby>新员工不用参加这个会议。<rt>Xīn yuángōng bùyòng cānjiā zhège huìyì.</rt></ruby>

- Subj. + 不用 + [Verb Phrase]

column1: <ruby>我们只去两天，你不用带这么多衣服。<rt>Wǒmen zhǐ qù liǎng tiān, nǐ bùyòng dài zhème duō yīfu.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>他说"咱们"，当然包括你。<rt>Tā shuō"zánmen", dāngrán bāokuò nǐ.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- He said "us". That certainly includes you.
- Expressing "including" with "baokuo"
- Subj. + 包括 + Obj.1 ( , + Obj.2, Obj.3 ... )

column1: <ruby>我每个月的房租不包括水电费。<rt>Wǒ měi gè yuè de fángzū bù bāokuò shuǐ diàn fèi.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- My monthly rent does not include my water and electric bill.
- Expressing "including" with "baokuo"
- Subj. + 包括 + Obj.1 ( , + Obj.2, Obj.3 ... )
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/我每个月的房租不包括水电费.mp3]

column1: <ruby>公司的福利包括很多方面。<rt>Gōngsī de fúlì bāokuò hěn duō fāngmiàn.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- The company's welfare benefits includes many aspects.
- Expressing "including" with "baokuo"
- Subj. + 包括 + Obj.1 ( , + Obj.2, Obj.3 ... )

column1: <ruby>他对很多话题都很感兴趣，包括政治。<rt>Tā duì hěn duō huàtí dōu hěn gǎn xìngqù, bāokuò zhèngzhì.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- He finds many topics of conversation interesting, including politics.
- Expressing "including" with "baokuo"
- Subj. + 包括 + Obj.1 ( , + Obj.2, Obj.3 ... )
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/他对很多话题都很感兴趣包括政治.mp3]

column1: <ruby>简历一般包括个人信息，教育背景，工作经历等。<rt>Jiǎnlì yībān bāokuò gèrén xìnxī, jiàoyù bèijǐng, gōngzuò jīnglì děng.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- A résumé generally includes a person's information, education background, work experience, etcetera.
- Expressing "including" with "baokuo"
- Subj. + 包括 + Obj.1 ( , + Obj.2, Obj.3 ... )
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/简历一般包括个人信息教育背景工作经历等.mp3]

column1: <ruby>包括税，两张机票一共是五千。<rt>Bāokuò shuì, liǎng zhāng jīpiào yīgòng shì wǔ qiān.</rt></ruby>

- Expressing "including" with "baokuo"

column1: <ruby>包括我在内，一共有十五个人参加这个会议。<rt>Bāokuò wǒ zàinèi, yīgòng yǒu shíwǔ gè rén cānjiā zhège huìyì.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Including myself, 15 people total participated in this meeting.
- Expressing "including" with "baokuo"
- 包括 + Obj. (+ 在内)，一共 ⋯⋯
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/包括我在内一共有十五个人参加这个会议.mp3]

column1: <ruby>包括奖金在内，这个月我拿了一万块钱工资。<rt>Bāokuò jiǎngjīn zàinèi, zhège yuè wǒ ná le yī wàn kuài qián gōngzī.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- Expressing "including" with "baokuo"
- 包括 + Obj. (+ 在内)，一共 ⋯⋯

column1: <ruby>包括母语在内，他一共会说四种语言。<rt>Bāokuò mǔyǔ zàinèi, tā yīgòng huì shuō sì zhǒng yǔyán.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Including my native language, I can speak a total of 4 languages.
- Expressing "including" with "baokuo"
- 包括 + Obj. (+ 在内)，一共 ⋯⋯

column1: <ruby>包括每个月的物业费，我们办公室的租金是两万。<rt>Bāokuò měi gè yuè de wùyè fèi, wǒmen bàngōngshì de zūjīn shì liǎng wàn.</rt></ruby>
column3:

column1: <ruby>我吃饭呢。<rt>Wǒ chīfàn ne.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>老板开着会呢，不方便接电话。<rt>Lǎobǎn kāi zhe huì ne, bù fāngbiàn jiē diànhuà.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>这个故事我听她说过一百多遍了。<rt>Zhège gùshi wǒ tīng tā shuō guo yī bǎi duō biàn le.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>我问了他很多次，可是他不告诉我。<rt>Wǒ wèn le tā hěn duō cì, kěshì tā bù gàosu wǒ.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>你没听见吗？我敲了好几下。<rt>Nǐ méi tīngjiàn ma? Wǒ qiāo le hǎo jǐ xià.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>我们可以帮你。<rt>Wǒmen kěyǐ bāng nǐ.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>我们见过几次面。<rt>Wǒmen jiàn guo jǐ cì miàn.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- We've met a few times.
- Separable verb

column1: <ruby>我们一起吃过几次饭。<rt>Wǒmen yīqǐ chī guo jǐ cì fàn.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- When you're available, let's go out for dinner.
- Separable verb

column1: <ruby>老板请大家吃了一顿饭。<rt>Lǎobǎn qǐng dàjiā chīle yī dùn fàn.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- The boss invited everyone to dinner.
- Separable verb

column1: <ruby>晚安！睡个好觉。<rt>Wǎn'ān! Shuì gè hǎo jiào.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Good night! I hope you can have some good sleep.
- Separable verb

column1: <ruby>昨晚我只睡了两个小时觉。<rt>Zuówǎn wǒ zhǐ shuì le liǎng gè xiǎoshí jiào.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I only slept two hours last night.
- Separable verb

column1: <ruby>我以为他是英国人。<rt>Wǒ yǐwéi tā shì Yīngguó rén.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I thought he is British.
- Expressing "mistakenly think that" with "yiwei"
- Subj. + 以为 ⋯⋯

column1: <ruby>你以为只有你知道？<rt>Nǐ yǐwéi zhǐ yǒu nǐ zhīdào?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- You think you are the only one who knows?
- Expressing "mistakenly think that" with "yiwei"
- Subj. + 以为 ⋯⋯

column1: <ruby>我以为土豆就是红薯。<rt>Wǒ yǐwéi tǔdòu jiùshì hóngshǔ.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I thought potato is sweet potato.
- Expressing "mistakenly think that" with "yiwei"
- Subj. + 以为 ⋯⋯

column1: <ruby>很多人都以为我二十几岁。<rt>Hěn duō rén dōu yǐwéi wǒ èrshí jǐ suì.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Many people thought I'm in my twenties.
- Expressing "mistakenly think that" with "yiwei"
- Subj. + 以为 ⋯⋯

column1: <ruby>我以为你们分手了。<rt>Wǒ yǐwéi nǐmen fēnshǒu le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I thought you guys broke up.
- Expressing "mistakenly think that" with "yiwei"
- Subj. + 以为 ⋯⋯

column1: <ruby>我们都以为你生气了。<rt>Wǒmen dōu yǐwéi nǐ shēngqì le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- We all thought you were angry.
- Expressing "mistakenly think that" with "yiwei"
- Subj. + 以为 ⋯⋯

column1: <ruby>你以为全世界都跟你一样有钱？<rt>Nǐ yǐwéi quán shìjiè dōu gēn nǐ yīyàng yǒuqián?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- You thought .
- Expressing "mistakenly think that" with "yiwei"
- Subj. + 以为 ⋯⋯
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/你以为全世界都跟你一样有钱.mp3]

column1: <ruby>我以为你俩分手了。<rt>Wǒ yǐwéi nǐ liǎ fēnshǒu le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I thought you two broke up.
- Expressing "mistakenly think that" with "yiwei"
- Subj. + 以为 ⋯⋯

column1: <ruby>蛋糕看起来很好吃。<rt>Dàngāo kànqǐlái hěn hǎochī.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- This cake looks really tasty.
- Appearance with "kanqilai"
- Subj. + 看起来 ⋯⋯

column1: <ruby>你男朋友看起来很成熟。<rt>Nǐ nánpéngyou kànqǐlái hěn chéngshú.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Your boyfriend seems very mature.
- Appearance with "kanqilai"
- Subj. + 看起来 ⋯⋯

column1: <ruby>老板看起来有点不高兴。<rt>Lǎobǎn kànqǐlái yǒudiǎn bù gāoxìng.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- The boss seems a little unhappy.
- Appearance with "kanqilai"
- Subj. + 看起来 ⋯⋯

column1: <ruby>你妈妈真年轻！看起来像你姐姐。<rt>Nǐ māma zhēn niánqīng! Kànqǐlái xiàng nǐ jiějie.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>我看起来像不像大老板？<rt>Wǒ kànqǐlái xiàng bu xiàng dà lǎobǎn.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Do I seem like a big boss?
- Appearance with "kanqilai"
- Subj. + 看起来 + 像 ⋯⋯

column3:
- You two look like a couple.
- Appearance with "kanqilai"
- Subj. + 看起来 + 像 ⋯⋯

column1: <ruby>他们看起来不像有钱人。<rt>Tāmen kànqǐlái bù xiàng yǒuqián rén.</rt></ruby>

- Subj. + 看起来 + 像 ⋯⋯

column1: <ruby>那个喝醉的男人看起来像你老公。<rt>Nà gè hēzuì de nánrén kànqǐlái xiàng nǐ lǎogōng.</rt></ruby>

- Subj. + 看起来 + 像 ⋯⋯

column1: <ruby>那个问题一点也不难。<rt>Nàge wèntí yīdiǎn yě bù nán.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- That question isn't difficult at all.
- Expressing "not at all" with "yidianr ye bu"
- Subj. + 一点 + 也 / 都 + 不 + Adj.

column1: <ruby>你一点也不胖。<rt>Nǐ yīdiǎn yě bù pàng.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- You're not even a little bit fat.
- Expressing "not at all" with "yidianr ye bu"
- Subj. + 一点 + 也 / 都 + 不 + Adj.

column1: <ruby>这个菜一点都不好吃。<rt>Zhège cài yīdiǎn dōu bù hǎochī.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- This dish isn't tasty at all.
- Expressing "not at all" with "yidianr ye bu"
- Subj. + 一点 + 也 / 都 + 不 + Adj.

column1: <ruby>我同事一点都不幽默。<rt>Wǒ tóngshì yīdiǎn dōu bù yōumò.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- My colleague is not humorous at all.

- Subj. + 一点 + 也 / 都 + 不 + Adj.

- Subj. + 一点 + 也 / 都 + 不 + Adj.

- Subj. + 一点 + 也 / 都 + 不 + Verb

- Subj. + 一点 + 也 / 都 + 不 + Verb

- Subj. + 一点 + 也 / 都 + 不 + Verb

column1: <ruby>邻居昨晚吵死了，我一点都没睡。<rt>Línjū zuówǎn chǎo sǐ le, wǒ  yīdiǎn dōu méi shuì.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>多亏了大家的帮助！<rt>Duō kuī le dàjiā de bāngzhù!</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Thanks to everyone's help!
- Expressing "thanks to" somebody with "duokui"
- 多亏（了）…… Good Outcome, 多亏（了）……

column1: <ruby>我的问题能这么快解决，多亏了他的人脉关系。<rt>Wǒ de wèntí néng zhème kuài jiějué, duō kuī le tā de rénmài guānxi.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Thanks to his connections, I can solve my problem so soon.
- Expressing "thanks to" somebody with "duokui"
- 多亏（了）…… Good Outcome, 多亏（了）……
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/我的问题能这么快解决多亏了他的人脉关系.mp3]

column1: <ruby>你没迟到，多亏了她的车。<rt>Nǐ méi chídào, duō kuī le tā de chē.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Thanks to her car, you were not late to get there.
- Expressing "thanks to" somebody with "duokui"
- 多亏（了）…… Good Outcome, 多亏（了）……

column1: <ruby>这件事情多亏了你的提醒，不然我肯定忘了。<rt>Zhè jiàn shìqing duō kuī le nǐ de tíxǐng, bùrán wǒ kěndìng wàng le.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Thank you for your reminding me about this matter! Otherwise I would definitely forget.
- Expressing "thanks to" somebody with "duokui"
- 多亏（了）……，不然 Subj. ……
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/这件事情多亏了你的提醒不然我肯定忘了.mp3]

column1: <ruby>多亏你送她去医院了，不然她的情况会很严重。<rt>Duō kuī nǐ sòng tā qù yīyuàn le, bùrán tā de qíngkuàng huì hěn yánzhòng.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Thanks to you taking her to the hospital, otherwise her condition can be really severe.
- Expressing "thanks to" somebody with "duokui"
- 多亏（了）……，不然 Subj. ……

column1: <ruby>多亏了你的建议，不然我还不知道怎么办.<rt>Duō kuī le nǐ de jiànyì, bùrán wǒ hái bù zhīdào zěnme bàn.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Thanks to your advice, otherwise I still don't know what to do about it.

- 多亏（了）……，不然 Subj. ……

column1: <ruby>多亏了你的车，我才没迟到.<rt>Duō kuī le nǐ de chē, cái wǒ méi chídào.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Thanks to your car, I'm not late to get here.
- Expressing "thanks to" somebody with "duokui"
- 多亏（了）……，Subj. 才 ……

column1: <ruby>多亏了你的介绍，我才有机会认识他.<rt>Duō kuī le nǐ de jièshào, wǒ cái yǒu jīhuì rènshi tā.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- 多亏（了）……，Subj. 才 ……

column1: <ruby>多亏你帮我，我才能这么快做完。<rt>Duō kuī nǐ bāng wǒ, wǒ cái néng zhème kuài zuò wán.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Thanks for your help, I can finish doing it so soon.
- Expressing "thanks to" somebody with "duokui"
- 多亏（了）……，Subj. 才 ……

column1: <ruby>你为什么不让我去？<rt>Nǐ wèishénme bù ràng wǒ qù?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Why wouldn't you let me go there?
- Causative verbs
- Subj. + [Causative Verb] + Person + Predicate

column1: <ruby>这部电影让人很感动。<rt>Zhè bù diànyǐng ràng rén hěn gǎndòng.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- This movie really moves people.
- Causative verbs
- Subj. + [Causative Verb] + Person + Predicate

column1: <ruby>那个老人让我想到了我爷爷。<rt>Nàge lǎorén ràng wǒ xiǎng dào le wǒ yéye.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- That old man makes me think about my grandpa.
- Causative verbs
- Subj. + [Causative Verb] + Person + Predicate
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/那个老人让我想到了我爷爷.mp3]

column1: <ruby>他不听话，你叫我怎么办？<rt>Tā bù tīnghuà, nǐ jiào wǒ zěnmebàn?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- He wouldn't listen to me. What are you expecting me to do?
- Causative verbs
- Subj. + [Causative Verb] + Person + Predicate

column1: <ruby>他偷偷约别的女孩，你叫我怎么想？<rt>Tā tōutōu yuē bié de nǚhái, nǐ jiào wǒ zěnme xiǎng?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- He secretly asked other girls out. What are you expecting me to think?
- Causative verbs
- Subj. + [Causative Verb] + Person + Predicate
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/他偷偷约别的女孩你叫我怎么想.mp3]

column1: <ruby>你儿子在学校的表现叫老师很头疼。<rt>Nǐ érzi zài xuéxiào de biǎoxiàn jiào lǎoshī hěn tóuténg.</rt></ruby>

column3:
- I want to ask you to do me a favor.
- Causative verbs
- Subj. + [Causative Verb] + Person + Predicate

column3:

column1: <ruby>他的演讲使听众们非常激动。<rt>Tā de yǎnjiǎng shǐ tīngzhòng men fēicháng jīdòng.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>经济危机使很多公司倒闭了，也使很多人失去了工作。<rt>Jīngjì wēijī shǐ hěn duō gōngsī dǎobì le, yě shǐ hěn duō rén shīqù le gōngzuò.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>我每天上班都经过这里。<rt>Wǒ měi tiān shàngbān dōu jīngguò zhèlǐ.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- I pass by this place every day on the way to work.
- Expressing "after" with "jingguo"

column1: <ruby>我坐火车回老家常常经过这个城市。<rt>Wǒ zuò huǒchē huí lǎojiā chángcháng jīngguò zhège chéngshì.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>经过这几年的发展，这个城市发生了很大变化。<rt>Jīngguò zhè jǐ nián de fāzhǎn ,  zhège chéngshì fāshēng le hěn dà biànhuà.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>经过一个星期的调查，警察认为他没有罪。<rt>Jīngguò yī gè xīngqī de diàochá, jǐngchá rènwéi tā méiyǒu zuì.</rt></ruby>

- 经过 + Event / Time ，⋯⋯

column1: <ruby>谁都不知道事情的经过。<rt>Shéi dōu bù zhīdào shìqing de jīngguò.</rt></ruby>

- Please tell us the whole story about f this car accident.

column1: <ruby>从我家走到这里需要通过两座桥。<rt>Cóng wǒ jiā zǒu dào zhèlǐ xūyào tōngguò liǎng zuò qiáo.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>你往前走，通过一个红色的大门，然后左拐就看到了。<rt>Nǐ wǎng qián zǒu, tōngguò yī shān hóng sè de dà mén, ránhòu zuǒ guǎi jiù kàn dào le.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>通过这次调查，我们发现很多员工对新政策都不满意。<rt>Tōngguò zhè cì diàochá, wǒmen fāxiàn hěn duō yuángōng duì xīn zhèngcè dōu bù mǎnyì.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>你不用过去，她会过来的。<rt>Nǐ bùyòng guòqù, tā huì guòlái de.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>你们不用都来，我们不需要这么多人。<rt>Nǐmen bùyòng dōu lái, wǒmen bù xūyào zhème duō rén.</rt></ruby>

- Subj. + 算 + (是) + Adj. + 的

column1: <ruby>在我们公司，我算年轻的。<rt>Zài wǒmen gōngsī, wǒ suàn niánqīng de.</rt></ruby>

- Making judgments with "suan"

- Subj. + 不 + 算 (+ Adv.) + Adj.

- Subj. + 不 + 算 (+ Adv.) + Adj.

- Subj. + 不 + 算 (+ Adv.) + Adj.

column1: <ruby>通过他的介绍，我认识了我现在的老板。<rt>Tōngguò tā de jièshào, wǒ rènshi le wǒ xiànzài de lǎobǎn.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>我没带钥匙，你得回来帮我开门。<rt>Wǒ méi dài yàoshi, nǐ děi huílái bāng wǒ kāimén.</rt></ruby>

- Subj. (+ 不) + 算 + Noun

- Making judgments with "suan"
- Subj. (+ 不) + 算 + Noun

column1: <ruby>我们认识，但是不算朋友。<rt>Wǒmen rènshi, dànshì bù suàn péngyou.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>你老板算大方的，我老板更小气。<rt>Nǐ lǎobǎn suàn dàfang de, wǒ lǎobǎn gèng xiǎoqì.</rt></ruby>

- Using "lai" as a dummy verb
- (让 +) Subj. + 来

column1: <ruby>她正看着报纸呢。<rt>Tā zhèng kàn zhe bàozhǐ ne.</rt></ruby>

- Subj. + 正在 + Verb + 着 + Obj. + 呢

column1: <ruby>我正喝着啤酒。<rt>Wǒ zhèng hē zhe píjiǔ.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>老师说今天没有作业，我们都高兴坏了。<rt>Lǎoshī shuō jīntiān méiyǒu zuòyè, wǒmen dōu gāoxìng huài le.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>我爷爷去了台湾以后已经三十年没回家了。<rt>Wǒ yéye qù le Tàiwān yǐhòu, yǐjīng  sānshí nián méi huíjiā le.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>她妈妈去世以后，她都两个多月没出门了。<rt>Tā māma qùshì yǐhòu, tā dōu   liǎng gè duō yuè  méi chūmén le.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>A:我在楼上，你上来。 B:你在楼上等我一下。我一会儿就上去。<rt>Wǒ zài lóushàng, nǐ shànglái. Nǐ zài lóushàng děng wǒ yīxià. Wǒ yīhuìr jiù shàngqù.</rt></ruby>

- Direction complement
- Verb + 来 / 去

column1: <ruby>A:出来玩吧，我们在酒吧等你。 B:我妈不让我出去。<rt>Chūlái wán ba, wǒmen zài jiǔbā děng nǐ. B: Wǒ mā bù ràng wǒ chūqù.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- Verb + 来 / 去

column1: <ruby>A:这是我家，进来吧，随便坐。 B:那是你的卧室吗？我能进去吗？<rt>Zhè shì wǒ jiā, jìnlái ba, suíbiàn zuò. Nà shì nǐ de wòshì ma? Wǒ néng jìnqù ma?</rt></ruby>
column3:
- This is my house. Please come inside. Feel free to take a seat. Is that your bedroom? Can I go in?
- Direction complement
- Verb + 来 / 去
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/这是我家进来吧随便坐那是你的卧室吗我能进去吗.mp3]

column1: <ruby>A:你下班了吗？几点回来吃饭？ B:我今天不回去吃饭。<rt>Nǐ xiàbān le ma? Jǐ diǎn huílái chīfàn? Wǒ jīntiān bù huíqù chīfàn.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- Direction complement
- Verb + 来 / 去

column1: <ruby>我下午在家，你可以到我家来。<rt>Wǒ xiàwǔ zài jiā, nǐ kěyǐ dào wǒ jiā lái.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>如果不好好复习，你就无法通过明天的考试。<rt>Rúguǒ bù hǎohǎo fùxí, nǐ jiù wúfǎ tōngguò míngtiān de kǎoshì.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>他如果不迷恋网络游戏，就能考上好的大学。<rt>Tā rúguǒ bù míliàn wǎngluò yóuxì, jiù néng kǎo shàng hǎo de dàxué.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- If he hadn't been so addicted to the video games, he would have been admitted to a better university.
- Expressing "if…, then…" with "ruguo…, jiu…"
- 如果 + Statement + 就 + Result
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/他如果不迷恋网络游戏就能考上好的大学.mp3]

column1: <ruby>我如果在北京找不到工作，就会回昆明。<rt>Wǒ rúguǒ zài Běijīng zhǎo bù dào gōngzuò, jiù huì huí Kūnmíng.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- 如果 + Statement + 就 + Result
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/我如果在北京找不到工作就会回昆明.mp3]

column1: <ruby>如果你去的话，帮我跟她问好。<rt>Rúguǒ nǐ qù de huà, bāng wǒ gēn tā wènhǎo.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- If you go, tell her I say hello.
- Expressing "if…, then…" with "ruguo…, jiu…"
- 如果 + Statement + 的话，(就) Result
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/如果你去的话帮我跟她问好.mp3]

column1: <ruby>如果下次有时间的话，一定要找我玩儿。<rt>Rúguǒ xià cì yǒu shíjiān de huà, yīdìng yào zhǎo wǒ wán er.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- Expressing "if…, then…" with "ruguo…, jiu…"
- 如果 + Statement + 的话，(就) Result
column5: [sound:allset/mp3/如果下次有时间的话一定要找我玩儿.mp3]

column1: <ruby>如果你不忙的话，可以帮我联系客户吗？<rt>Rúguǒ nǐ bù máng de huà, kěyǐ bāng wǒ liánxì kèhù ma?</rt></ruby>
column3:

- 如果 + Statement + 的话，(就) Result

column1: <ruby>我们一方面要让客户满意，另一方面又不能让公司有损失。<rt>Wǒmen yī fāngmiàn yào ràng kèhù mǎnyì, lìng yī fāngmiàn yòu bù néng ràng gōngsī yǒu sǔnshī.</rt></ruby>
column3:

column1: <ruby>小张请假了，怪不得今天没有看到他。<rt>Xiǎo Zhāng qǐngjià le, guàibude jīntiān méiyǒu kàndào tā.</rt></ruby>

- Expressing "no wonder"
- Reason ，怪不得 / 难怪 + [Observation]

column1: <ruby>天天迟到，怪不得他被炒鱿鱼。<rt>Tiāntiān chídào, guàibude tā bèi chǎoyóuyú.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- Expressing "no wonder"
- Reason ，怪不得 / 难怪 + [Observation]

column1: <ruby>她是你妹妹？难怪你们长得这么像。<rt>Tā shì nǐ mèimei? Nánguài nǐmen cháng de zhème xiàng.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- Reason ，怪不得 / 难怪 + [Observation]

column1: <ruby>你手机没电了？怪不得我打不通。<rt>Nǐ shǒujī méi diàn le? Guàibude wǒ dǎ bu tōng.</rt></ruby>
column3:
- Your cell phone is out of battery? No wonder I couldn't get through.

- Reason ，怪不得 / 难怪 + [Observation]

column1: <ruby>你放了醋？难怪这么难吃！<rt>Nǐ fàng le cù? Nánguài zhème nánchī!</rt></ruby>
column3:
- You put vinegar. No wonder it taste so bad!
- Expressing "no wonder"
- Reason ，怪不得 / 难怪 + [Observation]

column1: <ruby>怪不得她拉肚子，原来她昨天又吃火锅了。<rt>Guàibude tā lādùzi, yuánlái tā zuótiān yòu chī huǒguō le.</rt></ruby>
column3:

- Expressing "no wonder"
- 怪不得 / 难怪 + [Observation] ，原来 (+ 是) + Reason

column1: <ruby>难怪学生都不喜欢这个老师，原来他的作业太多了。<rt>Nánguài xuéshēng dōu bù xǐhuan zhège lǎoshī, yuánlái tā de zuòyè tài duō le.</rt></ruby>

- 怪不得 / 难怪 + [Observation] ，原来 (+ 是) + Reason

column1: <ruby>怪不得你们这么高兴，原来是要结婚了。<rt>Guàibude nǐmen zhème gāoxìng, yuánlái shì yào jiéhūn le.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>怪不得他没告诉我，原来是不想让我担心。<rt>Guàibude tā méi gàosu wǒ, yuánlái shì bù xiǎng ràng wǒ dānxīn.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>这也难怪他，他这么小。<rt>Zhè yě nánguài tā, tā zhème xiǎo.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>那个问题一点儿也不难。<rt>Nàge wèntí yīdiǎnr yě bù nán.</rt></ruby>

- Subj. + 一点(儿) + 也 / 都 + 不 + Adj.

- Subj. + 一点 + 也 / 都 + 不 + [Verb Phrase]

column1: <ruby>这个东西不但贵，而且难买。<rt>Zhège dōngxi bùdàn guì, érqiě nán mǎi .</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>等到你感觉不舒服就晚了。<rt>Děngdào nǐ gǎnjué bù shūfu jiù wǎn le.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>等雨停了我再出门。<rt>Děng yǔ tíng le wǒ zài chūmén.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>等我回了家，才发现手机忘在了出租车上。<rt>Děng wǒ huí le jiā, cái fāxiàn shǒujī wàng zài le chūzūchē shàng.</rt></ruby>

- A + 有 (+ B) + 这么 / 那么 + Adj. + 吗 ？

column1: <ruby>你要先做作业再看电视。<rt>Tā yào xiān zuò zuòyè, zài kàn diànshì.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>你先找工作再考虑买房子。<rt>Nǐ xiān zhǎo gōngzuò zài kǎolǜ mǎi fángzi.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>还好我们打车来的，不然就迟到了。<rt>Háihǎo wǒmen dǎchē lái de, bùrán jiù chídào le.</rt></ruby>

column1: <ruby>自己做饭一方面更健康，一方面还能省点钱。<rt>Zìjǐ zuòfàn yī fāngmiàn gèng jiànkāng, yī fāngmiàn hái  néng shěng diǎn qián.</rt></ruby>
